body:
I have a question on how to handle the situation where the preferred version of elfutils gets compiler errors with gnu 7,2 compilers.   Here is how I solved it temporarily for my own purposes, but how do we handle this in general.  Someone must have wanted version .163 to be the default, but that doesn't work for all builds.   So, asking for advice on how to fix for all to be happy.


    version('0.170', '03599aee98c9b726c7a732a2dd0245d5', preferred=True)
    version('0.168', '52adfa40758d0d39e5d5c57689bf38d6')
    #version('0.163', '77ce87f259987d2e54e4d87b86cbee41', preferred=True)
title: QUESTION: The preferred=True version elfutils doesn't build with gnu 7.2 compilers
